Applicant : Osler, Lisa
School (district) : Peregrine Elementary (West Ada)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);
LinkedIn Profile : N/A

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* The first step to motivating students is to be enthusiastic about a subject yourself. Working in an internship will give me the knowledge I could use to bring enthusiasm to students on various subjects. As a veteran teacher, I am fully aware that I avoid teaching subjects that I know little about. I would like to change the narrative in my own career and explore the world in new ways in order to bring knowledge and learning experiences into my classroom.

	* Earth & Environmental Science
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Math
	* Chemistry
